document_data.name: Felbris
document_data.mainbody: '''Felbris''' was a [[beholder]] who made his home in [[Gauntlgrym]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Felbris had dark brown skin. Its central eye had a green sclera, blue iris, and black pupil. The eyestalks had white scleras, blue irises, and black pupils.
document_data.Activities: Felbris invaded Gauntlgrym in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] and took control of it from the [[dwarves]] living there. Some time later, Felbris fell asleep. While having nightmares, its reality-warping powers manifested and with its nightmares it began to unravel Gauntlygrym.
document_data.History: After invading Gauntlgrym, four [[adventurer]]s ventured into Gauntlgrym to kill the sleeping beholder. It awoke and a fight ensued, likely leading to the beholder's death.
